service_alerts.subject: New Jersey Object Storage Cluster Maintenance

entries.message:
To clarify some questions we had received:
Downtime starts Oct 6, 1.30am UTC with duration of 4 hours.
All object storage data in EWR1 region (ewr1.vultrobjects.com endpoint) will be inaccessible as well as new VKE/VLB deployments in EWR1.
Existing VKE/VLB deployments should be unaffected.

Event Type: System Upgrade
Start Time: 2022-10-06  1:30:00 AM UTC
End Time:   2022-10-06  5:30:00 AM UTC

Dear Customer,

This is to notify you that the New Jersey Object Storage Cluster will be undergoing system maintenance. During the maintenance window object storage data (ewr1.vultrobjects.com endpoint) will be inaccessible and new VKE/VLB deployments will not work. Existing VKE/VLB deployments should be unaffected.

If you have any questions at all, please feel free to open a support ticket and we will be happy to work with you!

 

Thank you!

Vultr Storage Team

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Bangalore location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2022-09-27 22:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2022-09-28 02:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Bangalore instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.
